description:
Note: This product is part of a DLC set for those who purchased "FAIRY TAIL Season Pass".

5 "Diligence" Lacrima that increase the amount of experience earned by characters are added.

[Lacrima included]
‚óèDiligence
Effect: Increases experience earned from defeating monsters. (Note: Multiple can be equipped.)

Note: Lacrima can be equipped from "Main Menu" after advancing the game to a certain point.

Note: The content is obtained at the beginning of chapter 1, episode 1.
name: Limited Edition Growth Lacrima x 5
